author: @adamgdev
text: Very unique and highly valuable video here!  A couple of questions.  Can you recommend any recruiters for data analysts that place people in remote jobs?  If not, besides LinkedIn are there other places to look?  I am guessing Google.  At what point would I be ready to start accepting recruiters offers....A good website portfolio with a handful of projects on github, strong understanding of Pandas, relevant packages and MySQL? I am very curious to your response.  GREAT CONTENT!!!  Please keep it up!!!

author: @tranceformeeer
text: What a useful video! It has just popped up in my youtube flow. I just want to say a BIG THANK YOU for your awesome and informative videos. Keep up the good work! And a small story: I had no idea what to do with my life. I wanted to learn something which suits me. It was very very very difficult to find it, almost impossible. I got lot of inspirational stuffs here in youtube such as motivational video from Arnold Schwarzenegger. He said, the first rule: Have a vision! Now I know what to learn and what would I work. Without your videos it wouldn't be possible! I have vision. (Learn data analysis) I have career goals. (Be a data analyst) I have dream. (To be one of the best data analyst) THANKS! God bless you Alex!
